job_tasks.phrase: optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on improving business operations and customer experience, aligning technical work with business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: deliver maximum value with our AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the objective of leveraging AI to achieve business value, emphasizing the connection between technical implementation and business outcomes.

soft_skills.phrase: You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist
together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication
exchange knowledge and experiences with peers
every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa
optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality

classification.rationale: The job description is too vague and lacks specific technical tasks or technologies related to AI engineering. It focuses more on collaboration, business optimization, and learning within a broader engineering context rather than core AI development or MLOps.
